phrases: Edolas, the homeland of Carla and myself!
I am glad we made it there to search for our missing friends,
but there is a whole lot of things different in this world...
I never heard of something like that!
Everyone at the guild is acting odd...
What in the world is going on?!
What the hell are you doing sneaking around under there?
Now I take a closer look at ya, you are Natsu!
Where have you been this whole time?
You had me worried, damn it!
It is not nice to pick on him like that...
I cannot believe that is actually Cana!
I cannot believe that is actually Elfman!
How long are ya going to keep sobbing, you wimp!
I do not get this at all!
What in the world is going on?
Well, at least I am glad you are safe.
Is this all the effect of Edolas?
Is everything and everyone completely backwards?
Who are the girl and those cats?
What is the meaning of this?
Why are Exceeds here in a place like this?
Why is everyone so scared when they hear the word Exceed?
Phew, it was getting really hot.
You really look just like them.
Uh, do they look like them?
Or are they actually real ones?
It is just like Nee-chan said...
They just look exactly like Exceeds, is all.
They really do look just like cats, though...
Hey, do not take it off!
I was really damn worried about you!
Where were you and what the hell were you doing?
Natsu, you have to explain everything carefully!
This time it is the Screwdrive Elbow Crush!
The only difference is the elbow?
Maybe we should get going on a job, just the two of us!
Let us go, let us go!
What kind of job would you like, Al Al?
Let us go on a job that you enjoy, Bis Bis!
Al Al, you are so kind!
Even with everything backwards, I think there should be limits...
You said you were going on a job?
I sure wish I could go with you...
And I told you to stay away from me.
Juvia is going on a job by herself.
Because you are no help at all.
Gray-san, do not you think you should give up?
It was true for Leon-kun, too...
But I am not seeing any hope here.
Do not say the name of that bundled-up playboy in front of me!
I do not really understand, but I am not a fake!
Gray, do not be a lazy bum!
It is warm and comfy down here...
You are a lazy bum, and an embarrassment!
You are not getting away, Natsu!
What the hell you mean I suck, Levy?
Cannot you tell I am doing some delicate maintenance right now?
With you running around all over the place, I cannot concentrate!
I will try out my new technique on ya!
What the hell did you say?
I said I was in the middle of maintenance!
Then hurry the hell up with it!
We are really counting on you, Levy-san.
Without your engineering, this guild would be...
We are counting on you to make it quick.
It does not look like Erza-san is here...
You got to be kiddin' me...
Hey, so what do you think Erza's like over here?
What is the opposite of Erza, anyway?
How many times do I have to tell you?
I will never hold you back again, I promise, Natsu-san!
Fine, as long as you understand!
I am so honored to have your leadership!
Is not that just your secret desire, Natsu?
Then what do you think, Happy?
I think she would be like this, definitely!
Master Happy, leave this situation to me!
Master Happy, I will protect you, no matter what!
Sure, that is a real load off.
No, I think your desire is even worse...
I think she will be like this!
I improved my cooking skills for you, Wendy!
If you eat too much, you will get cavities...
Will you people stop fantasizing about such trifling trifles?!
What would she really be like?
Time to try out my new technique!
If you do not cut it out, even if you are Lucy, I am not going to...
You do not got the guts, chump.
Natsu-san actually talked back to Lucy-san!
That is quite a rare occurrence.
What the hell were you doing, and where?
This helmet has been very stuffy and I have no strength left.
I heard that you were raised by a dragon!
I sure wish I could see a dragon...
He is so big and strong!
Have you ever heard of Dragon Slayer magic?
Come on, let us go back inside and talk.
I wish this instant would last forever...
It is a grave for Elf-niichan's parakeet...
Then, you will make my grave for me, right, Natsu?
Why are you saying something like that?
You are going to die too, Lisanna?
If we could at least bury her...
There is a grave in the church, so why are you making one here?
She is not in a place like that.
Besides, she likes the sunset here...
Here, she will be able to watch it all she wants.
Even though I promised I would find her...
Will you come and find me, Natsu?
Since when did you start acting like an animal?
What the hell are you talking about?
Cry on my shoulder, just like old times.
Always fawning all over each other...
Well, you and Levy fight too much, Lucy!
She was supposed to have died, right?
Then it is not that everyone has turned opposite.
Mira has not changed at all.
Does not that girl look a bit like you, Wendy?
These people are not the ones we are looking for.
Edolas has its own culture and history.
There is a possibility it has its own Fairy Tail!
This is the Fairy Tail that was in Edolas to begin with?
Then where are the versions that we know?
What the hell are you blabbing about?
That is what we are trying to find out.
It will be trouble to stay here any longer.
There should be a clue about what happened to the guild in the Royal City!
Where do you think you are going?
This location's been found out already?
The people from the Kingdom are after us again...
The people who sent us to Earthland.
We are the enemies of Fairy Tail?
How long until the transmission magic circle, Levy?
I am working on it right now!
It is going to be too late!
Keep your head on straight, you loser.
There is no time to waste!
The Kingdom is after Fairy Tail?
By order of the King, all wizard guilds were abolished.
Only one is left in the world...
You came with Natsu, even though you did not know?
In other words, we are an underground guild.
We have passed the critical point for transmission!
I want to grab onto you, Juvia-chan!
Will we transfer safely, I wonder?
Using that much magical power so foolishly...
They really are quite the troublesome bunch.
Those fairies sure are quick at running, yes...
They flit from one place to another, like flies...
You were quite close, Fairy Hunter.
However, they will not be able to transfer too many more times.
It is only a matter of time until you catch your prey.
On another subject, it seems the giant Anima plan was a success.
So, all Magic Regiment Captains are to return to the Royal City.
The Earthland Fairy Tail was destroyed?
Our king sure does things in a big way.
What happened to the wizards that were absorbed from Earthland?
They have become a giant lacrima.
Now Edolas does not need to worry about magic power for the time being.
Looks like we were able to transfer in one piece.
All my layers came in handy, right?
I will give you my thanks.
What the hell were you taking your time for?
Why does it shake so much, anyway?
Because you are too fat, that is why!
Has it been so long you forgot?
She is one of the captains of the Kingdom's Magic Regiments...
Also known as Erza the Fairy Hunter.
The Lucy here is pretty scary.
I think the Lucy over there is plenty scary herself.
You might have a point there!
Now that I think about it, Lucy here is scary enough to give Lucy there a run for her money.
Uh, I am starting to get confused.
If we are there, and they are here, then which is which?
Next time: The Key of Hope!
Let us make it simple and call them Lucy A and Lucy B!
Then this one's Lucy A, and that one's Lucy B, right?
